text: Really great lunch specials. Choose from BLT, fried fish, chicken wings, chilli. The lady that runs it is super friendly and she cooks great! Everything I have tried on the menu is delicious and freshly made. Great place for catfish, the lortions are large and always hot from the fryer.
This is one of my favorite lunch spots. I love coming to mamas. The cook puts love into her food. You can always find a meal to suit your pocketbook. I suggest going in and trying it out!
I went there yesterday and everything i tried to order the guy said we're out of this or that so i just left. I won't be coming back.
